channel.title: Help

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @Oh_Hai Oh Hai
item.description:
@Oh_Hai wrote:

[quote=“Oh Hai, post:1, topic:304647”]I use devolution as my source. It’s easy for me to use. I’ve used this code below as a code to make me teleport when the monster is dead :

if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 55) { int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling; client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player]; ppl.teleportToX = 2727; ppl.teleportToY = 9774; ppl.heightLevel = 0; }

It wont work, could someone configure it for devolution please? Thank you. PS when i remove the ppl it wont work.[/quote]

And also I would like to create a simple dialogue :

Choice : Free Item ---- Gives item and closes Teleport ---- Teleports closing chat

thanks.

Read full topic
